title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: There are errors on the report page: There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.
EB: When saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the report page.
2. Set the table filter to the value new Date("3/2/2005").
3. Save and preview the report.
4. Verify that there are no errors on the report page and the filter works correctly.
